Resumé

Profile

  • profile
  • experience
  • skills

Open-minded medical student interested in general practice, internal medicine, neurology and psychiatry. Passionate about improving healthcare systems through health tech, research and policy innovations. Interested in applications of data science in healthcare and advances in psychedelic research. Part-time programmer, currently focussing on learning general principles in computer science. Amateur music producer, lowkey vinyl collector and avid sportsman.


Resumé is available in PDF-format on request!
